img_above_text:
![Buddhas Eye Secret Boss \(11\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1d/Buddhas_Eye_Secret_Boss_%2811%29.png)
Head right up to the top, and look for an opening where the sunlight comes in on the right. On the left, you’ll see the large stone structure of the Mother of Stones. Go outside and you’ll see the Buddha Head in the distance.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing a player character silhouetted in the foreground, standing on a rocky path. In the distance, a large stone Buddha head is highlighted, surrounded by barren trees and rocky terrain. The preceding text suggests this location is near the "Mother of Stones" structure, while the following text indicates this area is part of the "Buddha’s Eyes" sequence, specifically leading to the discovery of "Buddha’s Eyeball 5."
